name: Marquis Sanders
title: Budtender/Receptionist
coverLetter:
Hello

My name is Marquis Sanders; I'm genuinely passionionate, charismatic, and knowledgeable of marijuana as a whole.

Growing up, my father grew for cancer patients through the state of Oregon and I got to witness some of the magic of the process; it was then that the seed was germinated. I grew deeply intrigued and fond of the beautiful herb and submerged myself in its culture and positive energy. The plethora of versatility and medicinal benefits are truly miraculous. (Not to mention, my great grandmother was a medicine woman in Dominica.)The love of herbs/plants is in my blood. I've always loved the fact that people can be treated in a natural way and dodge all the side effects of pharmaceuticals, including addiction and death. I stand out because I'm stand up. I've ventured around to different dispensaries and time after time encountered the same scenario, which was Budtenders who couldn't answer any questions about genetics, cannabinoids, terpenes, or anything else other than, "it'd get me stoned.." I pride myself on giving helpful information, ensuring patients always leave with the best possible option(s) to suit their needs, and a great overall experience.


I'd love to hear back from you, thank you for your time. 


"Stay elevated."
